Variable Documentation

iu16 dst = LOG_START+2

Referenced by log_add(), and log_init().

bool log_enable

Enables/disables logging.

This must be set the TRUE, before any log_add has an effect. It can be also changed in between to switch off and on logging to reduce unwanted data in the logging area.

Referenced by log_add(), and log_init().
